law.catch_line: Reporting of neonatal abstinence syndrome cases.
law.text: All cases of neonatal abstinence syndrome (NAS) diagnosed among Kentucky resident births shall be reported to the Kentucky Department for Public Health by the facility where NAS is diagnosed. The report shall be made at the time of NAS diagnosis pursuant to guidance issued by the department.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 14, effective June 25, 2013.
